For those wondering People said they left w/parents Friday at Joint Andrews Base.Tmz said Saturday from Maryland w/Branson's jet.
The press confuses me need to get their facts straight but nice to see that the Obama girls are now able to do their own thing.
I have been through severe depression twice so I know how you feel! If you ever feel alone I will always be there to listen #bellletstalk
I learned that lesson 3 years ago when I had hit my low point and since then I have made so many of my dreams come true #bellletstalk
Don't let people tell u that u can't don't let them bring u down. There will always be people who love & believe in u #bellletstalk
@drewski1974 @celinedion She said it in both french and english not just in french. Plus most her vids are filmed in both languages
Nothing made me happier than what I saw today. Around the world people came together and stood up for what they believed in. #lovetrumpshate
Been up since 8am and I am exhausted so I'm finally off to bed. What a day...*sigh*

I'm going back to bed I can't watch this anymore #inaguration
Wow it's been almost 20 years since Princess Diana visited Angola. Her visit made me want to help in some way so I donated to @theHALOTrust

So I don't brag...like ever but I still cannot believe I was lucky enough last yr to make my dream of meeting Wills and Kate come true!!
